data.persona: I am a young professor, I just graduated from school to teach others all that I know. I am single and all the ladies seem to want to talk to me. I have my eye on a maid but she is owned by someone. I would like to work to buy her freedom as my own.
data.description:
You are in the the mysterious shop's entrance.
The shop has a look of mysterious foreign artifacts and luxuries, with silks and other materials adorning the walls. There are various trinkets from all around the world as well as spices of different colors and odors.
There's a mysterious book, some tongs, and a scroll here.
A book keeper is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a fire stoker.
